about.title: About De Smakelijke Bok
about.content: Welcome! I'm a passionate home cook who loves sharing recipes with the world. This website is my digital cookbook where I collect all my favorite dishes - from grandma's classics to new discoveries.
about.whyNameContent: Just like a goat that nibbles on everything, I love discovering all kinds of flavors and cuisines. From Italian pasta to Asian stir-fries - I try it all!
